movies.title: Mounam Pesiyathe
movies.description: A man's attitude towards women and love starts to change after he develops feelings for a woman.

movies.title: Sita Ramam
movies.description: An orphan soldier, Lieutenant Ram's life changes, after he gets a letter from a girl named Sita. He meets her and love blossoms between them. When he comes back to his camp in Kashmir,After he gets caught in jail, he sends a letter to Sita which won't reach her.
movies.cast: Dulquer Salmaan, Mrunal Thakur, Rashmika Mandanna

movies.title: Gilli
movies.description: Velu, an aspiring kabaddi player, goes to Madurai to participate in a regional match, where he rescues Dhanalakshmi from Muthupandi, a powerful man keen on marrying the girl against her will.

movies.title: Vikram
movies.description: A special investigator discovers a case of serial killings is not what it seems to be, and leading down this path is only going to end in a war between everyone involved.
movies.cast: Kamal Haasan, Vijay Sethupathi, Fahad Fazil, Suriya

movies.title: Anbe Sivam
movies.description: Two men, one young and arrogant, the other damaged - physically but not spiritually - by life, are thrown together by circumstances, and find that they are in some ways bound together by fate.

movies.title: Ayan
movies.description: A young man's smuggling lifestyle takes a serious turn, when a fierce rival tries to eliminate him from the business.

movies.title: Velaiyilla Pattathari
movies.description: A man's attitude towards women and love starts to change after he develops feelings for a woman.

movies.title: Maragadha Naanayam
movies.description: A young man races to find a legendary treasure which causes him many troubles.

movies.title: Padaiyappa
movies.description: The death of Padaiyappa's father destroys his family. But his luck changes, and he is able to lead a prosperous life, until his nemesis plots to ruin his happiness once more.
movies.cast: Shivaji Ganesan, Rajinikanth, Ramya Krishnan, Soundarya

movies.description: Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.
